item.title: How do i add items into 317 client? (so not nulled)
item.dc:creator: @tyang8 tyang8
item.description:
@tyang8 wrote:

mmm here a little tutorial on how to add a custom item thats works for me

Okay once u made ur item and make a dat file and gzipped it

open ur models folder

my models

Drag ur models in there

Now open class8.java
and enter this and change it to the one u want

if(i == 8010) any number for ur id above 8000 and below 15000 { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anInt174 = 14312; //Model invent/drop id class8.anInt181 = 1000; //Model zoom (decrease to zoom in) class8.anInt190 = 498; class8.anInt198 = 484; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -1; class8.anInt194 = -1; class8.anInt165 = 14313; //Model wield id (male) class8.anInt200 = 14313; //Model wield id (female) class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Zabimaru sword"; class8.aByteArray178 = "WTF renjis word".getBytes();

then save it and compile

Now go to ur server and log in and type ::pickup 8010 1
and make sure ur rights are 3 or 4 to be able to pickup
to change rights go to ur source the characters folder and click ur name and find characters rights = 0 change to 3 or 4

check ur inventory if it there

now try it.
Yay! it works

Read full topic
